member.name: T:EnigmasSecurity.Program
member.summary: This class calculates the cryptographic strength of Enigma.

member.name: M:EnigmasSecurity.Program.PlugboardStrength
member.remarks: Return value is all 256 byte values for maximum strength

member.name: M:EnigmasSecurity.Program.RotorTurning
member.remarks: Calculation is based on simple cycled rotation for each rotor.

member.name: M:EnigmasSecurity.Program.Factorial(System.Int32)
member.returns: Returns the factorial of the given value

member.name: M:EnigmasSecurity.Program.DoubleFactorial(System.Int32)
member.summary: Double Factorial the given integer value 'n'.
member.returns: Returns the double factorial of the given value.

member.name: M:EnigmasSecurity.Program.Permutation(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.returns: Returns the permutation from 'k' chooses from 'n'.

member.name: M:EnigmasSecurity.Program.Power(System.Numerics.BigInteger,System.Int32)
member.returns: Return the calculated Power from base and exponent.

member.name: M:System.StringExtensions.PadCenter(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new string that center-aligns the characters in this string by padding them with spaces on the left and right, for a specified total length.
member.param: Integer The number of characters in the resulting string, equal to the number of original characters plus any additional padding characters.
member.returns: String A new string that is equivalent to this instance, but center-aligned and padded on the left and right with as many spaces as needed to create a length of totalWidth. However, if totalWidth is less than the length of this instance, the method returns a reference to the existing instance. If totalWidth is equal to the length of this instance, the method returns a new string that is identical to this instance.

member.name: M:System.StringExtensions.PadCenter(System.String,System.Int32,System.Char)
member.summary: Returns a new string that center-aligns the characters in this string by padding them with spaces on the left and right, for a specified total length using user defined character.
member.param: Integer The number of characters in the resulting string, equal to the number of original characters plus any additional padding characters.
member.returns: String A new string that is equivalent to this instance, but center-aligned and padded on the left and right with as many spaces as needed to create a length of totalWidth. However, if totalWidth is less than the length of this instance, the method returns a reference to the existing instance. If totalWidth is equal to the length of this instance, the method returns a new string that is identical to this instance.

member.name: M:System.StringExtensions.PadRightCrop(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new string that left-aligns the characters in this string by padding them with spaces on the right, for a specified total length.
member.param: Integer The number of characters in the resulting string, equal to the number of original characters plus any additional padding characters.
member.returns: String A new string that is equivalent to this instance, but left-aligned and padded on the right with as many spaces as needed to create a length of totalWidth. However, if totalWidth is less than the length of this instance, the method will crop the right end to totalWidth. If totalWidth is equal to the length of this instance, the method returns a new string that is identical to this instance.

member.name: M:System.StringExtensions.PadRightCrop(System.String,System.Int32,System.Char)
member.summary: Returns a new string that right-aligns the characters in this string by padding them with spaces on the right, for a specified total length.
member.param: Integer The number of characters in the resulting string, equal to the number of original characters plus any additional padding characters.
member.returns: String A new string that is equivalent to this instance, but left-aligned and padded on the right with as many spaces as needed to create a length of totalWidth. However, if totalWidth is less than the length of this instance, the method will crop the right end to totalWidth. If totalWidth is equal to the length of this instance, the method returns a new string that is identical to this instance.
